mapper.select: SELECT p.cod AS 'productCod', p.prodname AS 'productName', d.name AS 'deptName', e.cod AS 'empCod', e.name AS 'empName', w.name AS 'warehouseName' FROM product p LEFT JOIN employee e ON p.employee_cod = e.cod LEFT JOIN department d ON e.department_cod = d.cod LEFT JOIN warehouse w ON p.warehouse_cod = w.cod WHERE p.cod = #{productCod}
